DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Effects Psycho-oncological Education Distress Quality Life Solid Tumor Cancer Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Solid tumor cancer patient complete chemotherapy curative intent experience psychological distress . As result patient experience poor quality life ( QOL ) , emotional vulnerability unnecessary emotional suffering . Purpose : To determine whether implementation nurse drive psycho-oncological educational session decrease psychological distress level improve QOL among solid tumor cancer patient receive complete chemotherapy curative intent . Methods : A randomized clinical trial ( RCT ) consist 28 eligible patient Sibley Memorial Hospital use compare effect psycho-oncological education treatment usual reduce psychological distress improve quality life . The intervention group receive one 60 minute session psycho-oncological education . The comparison group receive usual care include general information session offer prior treatment address broad side-effects treatment , overview treatment process identification additional resource . Participants assess psychological distress QOL level baseline two week intervention .
